titles.title: Thou Hidden Love Of God (familiar tune easy)

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thou hidden love of God Whose height - Whose depth Unfathomed no man knows I see from far Thy beauteous light I sigh for Thy repose My heart is pained nor can it be At rest till it finds rest in Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thy secret voice invites me still The sweetness of Thy yoke to prove And fain I would but though my will Seems fixed yet wide my passions rove Yet hindrances strew all the way I aim at Thee yet from Thee stray{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}'Tis mercy all that Thou hast brought My mind to seek her peace in Thee Yet while I seek but find Thee not No peace my wand'ring soul shall see Oh when shall all my wand'rings end And all my steps to Thee-ward tend{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Is there a thing beneath the sun That strives with Thee my heart to share Ah tear it thence and reign alone The Lord of every motion there Then shall my heart from earth be free When it has found repose in Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh hide this self from me that I No more but Christ in me may live My vile affections mortify Nor let one darling sin survive In all things nothing may I see Nothing desire or seek but Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Lord Thy sovereign aid impart To save me from low-thoughted care Chase this self-will through all my heart Through all its latent mazes there Make me Thy duteous child that I Ceaseless may Abba Father cry{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Each moment draw from earth away My heart which lowly waits Thy call Speak to my inmost soul and say "I am Thy Love - Thy God - Thy all" To feel Thy power to hear Thy voice To taste Thy love be all my choice{/lang-eng}
